com.nair.cache.expirable

Class ExpirableCacheCleaner<K,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • com.nair.cache.expirable.ExpirableCacheCleaner<K,V>
  • Type Parameters:
    K - the type of Keys that are being stored in the Cache.
    V - the type of Values that are being mapped to.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class ExpirableCacheCleaner<K,V>
extends java.lang.Thread
    This Class is used for Clean Up of the Expirable Cache. It runs as a Background thread.
    Author:
    vaishakh
